articles.title: Kim Jong Un Supervises Test-fire of Ballistic Missile
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Supervises Test-fire of Ballistic Missile
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, supervised a test-fire of ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2.
					 The test-fire of Pukguksong-2 was aimed to finally verify all the technical indexes of the weapon system and thoroughly examine its adaptability under various battle conditions, before its deployment at military units for action.
					
					 The Supreme Leader issued an order to launch the missile at the observation post.
					
					 Together with officials, he analyzed the results of the test-launch and expressed his great satisfaction over them, saying it is perfect.
					
					 Saying with pride that the missile's rate of hits is very accurate and Pukguksong-2 is a successful strategic weapon, he approved the deployment of this weapon system for action.
					
					 Now that its tactical and technical data met the requirements of the Party, this type of missile should be rapidly mass-produced in a serial way to arm the KPA Strategic Force, he said.
					
					 He set forth the strategic tasks for bolstering up the country's nuclear force.
					
					 He expressed belief that the national defence scientists and workers at the munitions factories intensely loyal to the WPK would produce better and more Juche weapons, nuclear offensive means of Korean style.
					
					 He had a photo taken with all the national defence scientists, technicians, workers and officials who carried out the successful test-launch.
					
					 Accompanying him were Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik, Jong Sung Il, Yu Jin, Jo Yong Won and other senior officials of the C.C., WPK and General Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the KPA Strategic Force.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ukrainian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ukrainian Party Leader
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from P. N. Symonenko, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Communist Party, on May 9.
					 The first secretary in the message extended heartfelt congratulations on behalf of the Party Central Committee to Kim Jong Un on the first anniversary of his election as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 We, communists of Ukraine, support the principled and steadfast party and state stand maintained by you in the struggle to ensure the security of the country and defend and strengthen the political and socio-economic independence, the message said, adding:
					
					 We wish you good health and greater success in your responsible party and state activities for socialism and the prosperity of the DPRK and well-being of the heroic Korean people.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Figure
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group who is on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The Italian figure handed the gift over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Italian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Italian Figure
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Italian Figure Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Italian Figure Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He looked round historical relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the story associated with the historic place.
					
					 He also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 At Kim Il Sung University he gave a lecture titled "Inheritance of guidelines of Juche and Songun".

articles.title: Premier Inspects Major Industrial Establishments in Hamhung
articles.content:
Premier Inspects Major Industrial Establishments in Hamhung
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju of the DPRK made a field survey of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.
					 He encouraged their workers, technicians and officials in a high-pitched drive for increased production.
					
					 Going round the industrial establishments, he learned in detail about their production and projects for capacity expansion.
					
					 At consultative meetings, he stressed the need to bring about collective innovation in the production of Juche fertilizer, vinalon and custom-built equipment and speed up the completion of projects for expanding production capacity. And he urged the relevant units to supply raw and other materials in time with responsibility.
					
					 The premier also inspected the Hamhung Woolen Mill and the Hamhung Knitwear Factory and took measures to increase the production of goods and realize the updating of production processes on a higher level.
					
					 Earlier, he made a field survey of the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory.

articles.title: Swedish Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Swedish Party Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Communist Party in Sweden led by Chairman Robert Mathiasson left here for home on Monday.

articles.title: 20th Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
20th Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair Opens
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The 20th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Monday.
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Ri Ryong Nam, Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations, and officials in the field of economy and trade, delegations from different countries and regions, foreign diplomatic envoys and their embassy officials here.
					
					 Pak Ung Sik, director of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation,  said in an opening address that over the last 20 years the fair has developed into a dignified international economic gathering for expanding the friendship and many-sided exchange between the DPRK and other countries and promoting the regional development.
					
					 He expressed belief that the current fair would be a good occasion in promoting the friendship and cooperation among countries and bringing about common economic development and prosperity.
					
					 O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, said in his congratulatory speech that the DPRK would expand the economic relations with various countries and regions and steadily boost bilateral and multilateral cooperation in the fields of the economy and trade on the principle of equality and mutual benefit.
					
					 The participants went round products presented to the fair by companies of various countries and regions, including the DPRK, Belarus, China, Iran, Italy, Indonesia, Vietnam, Cuba and Taipei of China.
					
					 The fair will run through May 25.

articles.title: DPRK Sportspersons Prove Successful in Int'l Games
articles.content:
DPRK Sportspersons Prove Successful in Int'l Games
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK sportspersons have proved successful in international games held in Thailand.
					 They bagged one gold medal and three silvers at the 7th Artistic Gymnastics Asian Championships held from May 16 to 21.
					
					 Kim Su Jong took a gold medal in the floor exercises, silver in vault and bronze in all-round gymnastic competition of the women's individual apparatus final.
					
					 Jon Jang Mi, Jong Un Kyong, Kim Won Yong, Kim Su Jong and Pyon Rye Yong took the second place in the women's team event.
					
					 Han Jong Hyok came second in the parallel bars of men's individual apparatus finals.
					
					 Pyon Rye Yong and Jon Jang Mi respectively came third in vault and asymmetric bars of women's individual apparatus finals.
					
					Meanwhile, Choe Il Gyong came first in women's 3,000m race of the Second Asian Juniors Athletics Championships which began on May 20.
					
					 Sim Hae Won finished third in asymmetric bars of women's individual apparatus finals of the 14th Asian Juniors Artistic Gymnastics Championships.

articles.title: Protecting Biological Diversity and Developing Tourist Resources Active in DPRK
articles.content:
Protecting Biological Diversity and Developing Tourist Resources Active in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Today is the world day of biological diversity.
					 On this occasion, the UN set its theme in "Biological Diversity and Sustainable Tourism" to call for positively protecting biological resources which ensure various tourist resources, cultural and emotional life and natural benefits to all mankind.
					
					 The DPRK has been pushed ahead with protecting biological diversity and developing rich tourist resources with several laws on protecting biological resources enacted.
					
					 There are many tourist destinations in the DPRK like Pyongyang, Wonsan and Kaesong cities and Mts Paektu, Kumgang and Myohyang.
					
					 Now, big efforts have been paid to developing the Wonsan-Mt Kumgang international tourist zone, an aggregation of natural and social tourist resources.
					
					 In recent years, Wonsan, a port city of the DPRK, has been turned into a tourist destination for summer and winter seasons with the completion of the Masikryong Ski Resort and the remodeling of Songdowon International Children's Camp.

articles.title: Child Health Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Child Health Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the Taedongmun Kindergarten in Central District of Pyongyang on Monday to mark the Child Health Day.
					 Present there were members of the Korean Association for Supporting the Children and officials concerned in the fields of public health and media, the head of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK and staff members of various international organizations here.
					
					 There was a seminar on the child health.
					
					 The speakers referred to such issues arising in the work related to the child health as the treatment of diseases and the preventive and curative medical care.
					
					 The participants looked round photos showing the happy children in the DPRK and aid activities of missions of international organizations and enjoyed an art performance and sports games of kindergarteners.

articles.title: Lecture Given in Tokyo
articles.content:
Lecture Given in Tokyo
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Han Ho Sok, director of the Reunification Institute in the U.S., gave a lecture on the subject "DPRK-U.S. nuclear standoff goes to end and the day of national reunification is approaching" in Tokyo of Japan on May 19 to mark the 45th anniversary of the July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Attending it were Korean residents of different social standings from different parts of Japan.
					
					 The lecturer referred to the fact that Western media are misrepresenting the truth about the Korean issue to mislead the world public with false reports.
					
					 He urged Koreans in Japan to judge the developments with the Juche-based viewpoint as master of reunification.
					
					 The tremendous nuclear deterrence of the DPRK was proved through the successful test-fire of Hwasong-12, a ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket, on May 14, he stated.
					
					 He stressed that when the DPRK wins in the nuclear standoff with the U.S., a radical turn will be brought in the way for Korea's reunification desired by the entire nation.
					
					 He called upon all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to pool their efforts for building a reunified powerful country with confidence and optimism for the future.
					
					 At the end of the lecture, the participants made signatures on a large flag depicting the reunified Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Call for Opening Second June 15 Era
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Call for Opening Second June 15 Era
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Residents Association in Japan and south Korean Youth League, Democratic Women's Society and Students' Council in Japan made public a joint statement on May 18, 37 years after the Kwangju Popular Uprising in south Korea, which called for opening up the second June 15 era. The June 15 era means the era after the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted in 2000.
					 The Kwangju Popular Uprising in May 1980 was a fierce struggle for democratization against dictatorship and a historic turning point that revealed the fact that the U.S. was behind the south Korean military dictatorial regime, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The spirit of the Kwangju Popular Uprising was inherited by the democratic resistance in June 1987 and the largest-ever candlelight revolution that ousted and drove to the prison Park Geun Hye who allowed influence peddling in the "state affairs", violated the "Constitutional" order and committed thrice-cursed crimes.
					
					 The new regime should urgently mend the deadlocked south-north relations under the inter-Korean declarations such as the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 And it has to promptly abrogate the "Security Law" suppressing the movement for peace and reunification.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes "Story of North's Manipulation of Cyber-attack"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes "Story of North's Manipulation of Cyber-attack"
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The conservative media of south Korea are spreading misinformation about the DPRK over the Ransomware cyber-attack that occurred in various countries.
					 The pseudo media including Yonhap News, Seoul Economic Daily and KBS are putting it that there is assertion that the north is behind the ransomware hacking that attacked the world and that the code of virulent virus that caused the recent incident is similar to that used by the hackers' group suspicious of having linkage with the DPRK.
					
					 This is dirty and despicable smear campaign.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the recent story about the "north's manipulation of the recent incident" is pursuant to the conservative forces' bid to tarnish the image of the DPRK making steady victorious progress and to quench the demand for improving the north-south relations mounting significantly high among south Koreans.
					
					 The group of conservatives faulted the DPRK for no reason as they are afraid of the independent country bolstering its might while displaying the vitality of its socialist system despite the hostile forces' harsh sanctions and pressure.
					
					 That's why they cooked up the clumsy farce in order to internationally isolate the DPRK after branding it as a criminal and chill the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 Utterly ridiculous is the movement of the pseudo-media getting clamorous about the "north's behind-the-scene manipulation" to the tune of the conservative forces' racket for escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 By origin, the south Korean forces are apt to blame the DPRK whenever something deplorable happen either inside and outside.
					
					 At times of Choenan warship sinking case, case of breakdown of network of peasants' association, Wonjon hacking case, March 20 hacking case, GPS jamming case and drone case, they groundlessly linked them with the DPRK only to be disgraced after the disclosure of truth.
					
					 They are obsessed to the extremes with smear campaign and fabrication.
					
					 There are strong voices commenting that the recent case can not be seen as an act done by the north and the code might have been imitated to make them look like the north's.
					
					 It is only the south Korean puppet forces out of many countries and regions that have fallen victim to the recent cyber-attack that are relating the case with the DPRK.
					
					 Instead, lots of experts of the world are blaming the U.S. for the case.
					
					 However, even the puppet military are chiming in the puppet media, getting themselves busy putting on a higher alert the "posture for shielding cyber-attack information theatre".
					
					 The smear campaign of the puppet conservatives would only reveal their wretched plight finding themselves in the worst fix, forsaken by the nation.
					
					 Those who are behind the "story about north's involvement in the cyber-attack" will be made to pay a dear price for their crimes.
					
					 The group of conservatives and pseudo-media serving it should not run wild, clearly mindful that no mercy will be shown for those keen on tarnishing the dignified image of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group's Childish Burlesque
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group's Childish Burlesque
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative media said that fatal "ransome ware" happened in different countries of the world may be linked with the DPRK, crying out for the "story behind the north", says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Conservative media including Yonhap News and KBS reported sheer sophism that "there is assertion that the north is behind 'ransome ware' hacking which strikes hard the whole world" and the "vicious code used by the hacker is a similar to a hacking group being suspected of linkage to the north". And "the CIA is search-lighting the north's cyber attack as main threat" in a bid to make their sinister misinformation sound plausible.
					
					 Pulling up the DPRK in a bid to incite the confrontation with compatriots is an inveterate bad habit and stereotyped phrases used by the puppet conservative group. 
					
					 Those who have reason and common sense are deriding over the fact that the puppet conservative media's ridiculous story is nothing but paradox of under-wits who have no elementary ability to discriminate matters.
					
					 Among many countries and regions which suffered cyber attack, only the puppet group is trying to link the incident with the DPRK.
					
					 It is a cynical ploy of the puppet conservative group to dampen the dignified image of the DPRK and prevent the increasing south Korean public demand for improving the inter-Korean relations by kicking off the smear campaign against the north on the occasion of the cyber attack.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Give up Policy of Dependence on Outside Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Give up Policy of Dependence on Outside Forces
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Now south Korea is suffering disgrace as servant of outsiders without independence owing to the preceding ruling quarters who persisted in confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, while seeking power and glory in return for selling off national dignity and interests to outside forces, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary.
					 Disclosing the traitorous acts of the pro-U.S. conservative group going against national independence, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Although the south Korean authorities turn to outside forces over the "nuclear issue of the north", "special envoys" of south Korea dispatched to the U.S., China and other countries suffer diplomatic contempt and cold reception for failing to take their proper seats at diplomatic meetings.
					
					 Such isolation and crisis faced by south Korea is the due outcome of the deep-rooted policy of dependence on outsiders pursued by the Park Geun Hye group which was obsessed with pro-U.S. sycophancy.
					
					 The DPRK set forth the noble idea of great national unity calling upon all Koreans who love the country and nation to get united close, prioritizing the common interests of the nation, irrespective of idea, political view, ism, class and social stratum, and it has made every possible effort to realize it.
					
					 However, the pro-U.S. conservative group of south Korea, keen on dependence on outsiders, has been obsessed by escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen, in conspiracy with outsiders, indifferent to the DPRK's compatriotic stand and proposal for settling the national issue, the reunification issue by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 A grim situation in which a war may break out any moment is prevailing on the Korean peninsula. This is an inevitable outcome of the policy of depending on outsiders pursued by the pro-U.S. conservative forces who have been hell-bent on the moves for a war against the north in collusion with the aggression-minded outsiders.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should no longer resort to the foolish act of depending on outsiders of inviting misfortune, clearly mindful that dependence on outsiders will lead them to ruin.
					
					 We will neither tolerate any attempt of outsiders to realize their aggressive and dominationist ambition while interfering in the internal issue of the nation, the reunification issue, nor pardon traitors who sell off the interests of the nation while kowtowing to outsiders.
					
					 National independence is the only way of unity, peace, reunification and prosperity, and dependence on outsiders will lead to disgrace, submission and ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Should Stop Toeing U.S. Line
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Should Stop Toeing U.S. Line
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- From traitor Syngman-Rhee to traitor Park Geun Hye, all puppet rulers of south Korea invited ruin by themselves through their sycophancy toward outsiders and reckless escalation of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					 The May 16 military coup engineered by traitor Park Chung-Hee in 1961 was a product of his sinister design to quench the south Korean people's ardent desire for independence and democracy of society and great national unity and peaceful reunification at the point of bayonet and perpetuate the military dictatorship and the national division.
					
					 In the early 1970s, the north-south dialogue for national reconciliation and independent reunification always proved futile, due to traitor Park who called for "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" though he agreed on the three principles of national reunification.
					
					 Chun Doo Hwan's regime in the 1980s chilled the atmosphere of national reconciliation, created with the provision of relief aids by the people in the north to the flood-stricken south Koreans as a momentum, by cooking up conspiratorial cases like a spy ring incident at the U.S. beck and call.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak, asserting that it is impossible to hold hands with the north with nukes, termed the idea of By Our Nation Itself specified in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration "narrow-minded nationalism" and "chauvinism", and the precious June 15 era of reunification a "lost decade", only to rupture the north-south ties.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye, far from learning a lesson from the miserable death of her father, worked hard to revive his "yusin" dictatorship and pursued ill-natured "north policies" like "trust-building process" and "Dresden declaration," dreaming a wild dream for "unification through absorption." She always fawned upon outsiders and solicited their cooperation in stifling the compatriots in the north during her visits to foreign countries including the U.S.
					
					 Her regime danced to the tune of the U.S. trumpeting about "human rights" by instituting a "law on human rights in the north" and setting up the UN "office on human rights in north" in south Korea. When the U.S. cried out for "dismantling the nukes in the north", the regime shut down the Kaesong Industrial Park, the last hope of the north-south ties, under the pretext of "leading the north to abandon its nukes" and slapping "toughest sanctions" against it. Her regime even allowed the U.S. to deploy its THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 It was inevitable that the successive rulers of south Korea including traitor Park Geun Hye met miserable ends for the crimes they committed against the nation and reunification by pursuing heinous policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north, only to bring the north-south ties to total collapse.
					
					 The basic principle for settling the issue of the nation is to hold high the banner of national independence in dealing with the matters related to the improvement of north-south relations and the national reunification, though the situation is complicated and acute.
					
					 The south Korean regime should make a bold decision to drop the habit of sycophancy towards the U.S. and the humiliating policy of kowtowing to it.

articles.title: Elimination of S. Korean Conservatives Urged
articles.content:
Elimination of S. Korean Conservatives Urged
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement "Let us eliminate the puppet conservative remnants" on May 19.
					 Now human scum who served traitor Park Geun Hye at Chongwadae try to cover up the crimes of the evil witch despite the public protest, sparking off surging anger of the people in south Korea, the statement said.
					
					 It expressed the will of all Koreans in China to more vigorously stage the struggle with the south Korean people to wipe out the remnants of the Park Geun Hye group.

articles.title: Korean Book-Donation Ceremony Held in Algeria
articles.content:
Korean Book-Donation Ceremony Held in Algeria
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A Korean book-donation ceremony took place at the University of El－Djezair No. 1 of Algeria on May 17 on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of the conferment of an honorary doctorate on President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venue of the event were works of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and books about socialist Korea.
					
					 Present there were the president and other figures of the university and the DPRK ambassador to Algeria and his embassy officials.
					
					 Korean books were conveyed to the president of the university at the ceremony.
					
					 The president of the university expressed his deep thanks for the donation of the books.
					
					 He said that the university deemed it the greatest honor to award Kim Il Sung the honorary doctorate. 
					
					 Those books will make positive contributions to the research and study of the teachers and students of the university.

articles.title: Foreign Papers and Websites Introduce KPA Victorious History
articles.content:
Foreign Papers and Websites Introduce KPA Victorious History
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Articles were carried in foreign papers and websites in the period from April 21 to 29 on the occasion of the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Iranian paper The Iran News ran an article titled "80 odd years with Songun revolution".
					
					 The article said that the KPA founded by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, created the history of victory and glory of more than 80 years with the Songun revolution.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk ran an article titled "Invincible KPA". The article said that the political and ideological might, tremendous military and technical might and the great unity of the army and the people were factors in the invincibility of the Korean revolutionary armed forces. It went on:
					
					 The KPA has been led by the great brilliant commanders generation after generation. This is the most important of factor in its invincibility.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of the KPA, is a legendary brilliant commander who defeated U.S. and Japan imperialism in one generation, and leader Kim Jong Il is a peerlessly brilliant commander who won victory after victory in the political and military confrontation with the U.S. imperialists through his original Songun politics.
					
					 Thanks to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the KPA will emerge ever-victorious.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al Akhbar Almassay, and websites of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy carried articles on the history of the KPA who has emerged ever-victorious under the leadership of the outstanding brilliant commanders.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vio el lanzamiento de prueba de Pukguksong-2
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vio el lanzamiento de prueba de Pukguksong-2
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio el disparo de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de largo y mediano alcance del tipo Pukguksong-2.
					Este lanzamiento efectuo con el objeto de comprobar finalmente los indices tecnicos del sistema general de Pukguksong-2 y revisar suficientemente las posibilidades de su aplicacion en distintas situaciones de combate para emplazarlo en las unidades.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se dirigio junto con los funcionarios acompanados al puesto de observacion donde dio la orden de disparo.
					
					El analizo y evaluo junto con los funcionarios el resultado del lanzamiento y expreso una gran satisfaccion.
					
					Diciendo con orgullo que es muy exacto el acertamiento del cohete y Pukguksong-2 deviene el arma estrategico de exito, aprobo su disposicion en las unidades.
					
					Agrego que los datos tacticos y tecnicos de Pukguksong-2 se llegaron perfectamente a la meta del partido e instruyo que hay que producirlo en gran cantidad y en serie para armar al ejercito estrategico del EPC con esta arma.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dio las tareas estrategicas que se presentan en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y seguridad de que el dominio de ciencias para la defensa nacional y los trabajadores de la industria armamentista, infinitamente fieles a la direccion del partido, fabricaran mucho mas las armas poderosas de tipo Juche y los equipos de ataque nuclear de nuestro estilo.
					
					Se fotografio junto a los cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios del sector de defensa nacional quienes volvieron a lograr exitos en el disparo de Pukguksong-2.
					
					Le acompanaron Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik, Jong Sung Il, Yu Jin, Jo Yong Won y otros los funcionarios directivos del CC del PTC, asi como el general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente dedicado por personalidad italiana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente dedicado por personalidad italiana
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dedicara el presidente del Grupo de Inversion General de Italia, Giancarlo Elia Valori, quien esta de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo traslado el dia 22 al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Giancarlo Elia Valori
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Giancarlo Elia Valori
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 22 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el presidente del Grupo de Inversion General de Italia, Giancarlo Elia Valori, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita la reeleccion de Hassan Rouhani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita la reeleccion de Hassan Rouhani
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion a Hassan Rouhani con motivo de su reeleccion como presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran.
					En la misiva, el remitente enfatizo que su reeleccion es una expresion de gran confianza y apoyo del pueblo irani.
					
					Deseando los exitos en las responsabilidades del mandatario irani para construir un Iran independiente y prospero, Kim expreso la conviccion que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises se desarrollaran y se consolidaran en la lucha conjunta por defender la paz y estabilidad del mundo y hacer valer la verdadera justicia internacional.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre fabricas y empresas de Hamhung
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre fabricas y empresas de Hamhung
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno como operan el Complejo de Fertilizantes de Hungnam, el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong en la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur. 
					El estimulo a los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios que se esfuerzan por incrementar la produccion.
					
					En su recorrido por varios puntos, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion y de ampliacion de la capacidad productiva de los complejos y convoco las reuniones de consulta. 
					
					En esas ocasiones, se discutieron los problemas tales como registrar innovacion solidaria en la produccion del abono Juche, el vinalon y los equipos encargados y terminar con antelacion la construccion de varios objetos para la ampliacion de capacidad productiva. Ademas, se exigio a las unidades vinculadas abastecer a tiempo de las materias primas y materiales necesarios. 
					
					El premier estuvo tambien en la Fabrica Textil de Lana de Hamhung y la Fabrica de Generos de Punto de Hamhung donde tomo las medidas para aumentar la produccion y modernizar los procesos productivos en un nivel mas alto. 
					
					Con anterioridad, el visito la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang.
